Decoding Json

default(obj)

default method for JSONEncoder.

Parameters:

  • obj (Instance of the object) –

  • Results –

  • ------ –

  • instance (Depends upon the) – if instance is nan, it will return np.nan. if instance is inf, it will return np.inf. if instance is -inf, it will return -np.inf.

Encoding Json

default(obj)

default method for JSONEncoder.

Parameters:

  • obj (Instance of the object) –

  • Results –

  • ------ –

  • type (Depends upon the instance) – if instance is integer, it will return int. if instance is float, it will return float. if instance is string, it will return string. if instance is UUID, it will returns string.
